definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: Between Alonso and Hamilton, who is stronger?
sentences.chinese: 阿隆索和漢密爾頓誰更強？

sentences.english: This was not what I'd wanted at all and had caught me little off guard to say the least - I'm supposed to be relaxing in my last few days on Hamilton Island.
sentences.chinese: 在漢密爾頓島的最後幾天，我本應該好好放鬆一下。

sentences.english: Hamilton said he lost time in T9 (where Webber crashed) and on the final hairpin he lost whatever advantage he had.
sentences.chinese: 漢密爾頓說在9號彎角和最後一個回頭彎沒有跑好。

sentences.english: School officials declined to allow the Journal an interview with Hamilton.
sentences.chinese: 學校的官員拒絕讓雜誌社採訪漢密爾頓老師。

sentences.english: And you Mrs. Hamilton. I know just how much that means to you.
sentences.chinese: 啊，漢密爾頓太太，我知道那戒指對您的意義有多大。
漢密爾頓看起來垂頭喪氣。

sentences.english: Hamilton peers first at me then at the image.
sentences.chinese: 漢密爾頓起先凝視着我，又看了看照片。
漢密爾頓出生於皮姆利科。

sentences.english: Hamilton was fatefully drawn to women in distress.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵是漢密爾頓喜歡處在痛苦中的女人。

sentences.english: The waikato university in New Zealand's north island Hamilton city.
sentences.chinese: 懷卡託大學位於新西蘭北島的漢密爾頓市。

sentences.english: Did you guys notice Hamilton on the post-qualifying weighing (or what ever it is)?
sentences.chinese: 你好像總是找漢密爾頓的麻煩嗎？

sentences.english: Jeff Hamilton, Karrin and John Pizzarelli in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 傑夫漢密爾頓，Karrin和約翰比沙韋利在日本。

sentences.english: Hamilton became a draughtsman at an engineering company.
sentences.chinese: 漢密爾頓在一個工程公司當上了繪圖員。

sentences.english: Last Sunday's Japanese station, Hamilton was again hotheaded .
sentences.chinese: 上週日的日本站，漢密爾頓再一次頭腦發熱。
漢密爾頓喜歡玩文字遊戲。

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1

definition: Rowling (name)/Joanne Kathleen Rowling (1965-), author of the Harry Potter series of novels
Brooklyn, borough of New York City
